title: user registration with valid data
description: Test the /api/auth/register endpoint to ensure a new user can be registered successfully with valid input data including fullName, email, password, phoneNumber, guardianName, and role.

title: user login with correct credentials
description: Test the /api/auth/login endpoint to verify that a user can log in successfully with valid email and password, and receives a JWT token.

title: get current user with valid token
description: Test the /api/auth/me endpoint to ensure it returns the current authenticated user's data when a valid JWT token is provided.

title: create new student with valid data
description: Test the POST /api/students endpoint to verify that a new student profile can be created successfully with valid input data including fullName, email, phone, course, address, class, dob, and referralCode.

title: get all students with authorization
description: Test the GET /api/students endpoint to ensure it returns a list of all students when accessed with a valid JWT token and proper authorization.

title: get student dashboard data with valid token
description: Test the GET /api/dashboard/student endpoint to verify that the student dashboard data is returned correctly for an authenticated student user.

title: upload document with valid file and metadata
description: Test the POST /api/documents/upload endpoint to ensure a document file can be uploaded successfully with valid file, type, and description, and that PDF processing and cloud storage integration work correctly.

title: get admin dashboard statistics with authorization
description: Test the GET /api/admin/dashboard/stats endpoint to verify that admin users can retrieve dashboard statistics with proper authentication and authorization.

title: get performance metrics with valid token
description: Test the GET /api/performance/metrics endpoint to ensure it returns real-time performance metrics data when accessed with a valid JWT token.

title: submit contact form with valid data
description: Test the POST /api/contact endpoint to verify that the contact form can be submitted successfully with valid name, email, subject, and message, and that email notifications are triggered.
